(OOC: Sorry I haven't been posting. Yesterday was Father's Day, I spent the 
entire day in NY. If my post contradicts  with anything please let me know, 
I had over 200 e-mails to check and may have missed something of 
importance.)

Tavatron stumbled as the ark shook and rocked with each new attack. She 
growled softly to herself, what the slag was she doing in here while a 
battle raged out there? Tavatron transformed and with an incredile burst of 
speed ran through the ark to the bridge, stopping just before the massive 
doors in order to transform and unsheathe her staff.

With a growl Tavatron pushed open the door with her shoulder and stepped 
onto the battlefield. She gazed about the field, shards of metal and rock 
rained about her. Things didn't look good, but she had never been one to run 
from a fight. With a snarl/roar Tavatron charged into battle, but stopped 
when she saw Dinobot. She quickly ran towards him, doing her best to dodge 
missles and plasma shots. Tavatron skidded to a halt beside him.

Dinobot didn't look so good, his armor was streaked with dirt and 
mech-fluid, and the numerous cracks and scratches didn't help ease her 
concerns. Tavatron snarled to herself for taking so long to engage the 
enemy, it wasn't like her. However, there was no time to worry about that 
now, she was here, and the enemy was standing before her.

Tavatron fired her optic lasers at the first 'bot she saw, Pyro, while using 
her staff's energon blades in order to block various charges.
